en.title: Congratulations! FusionExcel Sponsored Oscar Wai Creates New Malaysian Record for Longest Non-Stop Karaoke Solo Singing!
en.content:
Mock Certificate Presented by Mr. Ricky Yap, The Malaysia Book of Records Official,
in the Presence of Principal Witness Mr. Choo Choong Hee, JP
Venue : Skyroom Federal Hotel Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
Dates of Attempt : 24th August 2008 and 25th August 2008.
Commencement : 12:00 noon 24th August 2008.
End : 1:10pm 25th August 2008.
Duration : 25hrs 10mins.
  (include 4 breaks of 15mins each after every 5hrs, i.e. total 1hr)
Official Record Time : 24hrs 10mins.
No. of Songs Rendered :405 songs, without repetitions.
Languages/Dialects : English, Mandarin, Malay, Cantonese, Hokkien.
